explains: adj. 中年的；具有中年人特点的；适合于中年人的

sentences.en: His fan base is mostly middle-aged ladies.
sentences.cn: 他的粉丝群主要是中年妇女。

sentences.en: The guests were mostly middle-aged men talking business.
sentences.cn: 客人们大多是谈生意的中年男人。

sentences.en: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children.
sentences.cn: 这本书的主要部分讲的是桑迪的两个中年孩子。
